{{Infobox_Company | company_name = Embarq Missouri, Inc.| company_logo = | company_type = [[Private company|Private]] ([[Subsidiary]] of [[CenturyLink]])| company_slogan = | foundation = 1929| location = | key_people = | industry = [[Telecommunications]]| num_employees = | revenue = | parent = [[Sprint Nextel|United/Sprint Nextel]] (1929-2006)
[[Embarq]] (2006-2009)
[[CenturyLink]] (2009-present)| products = [[Plain old telephone service|Local Telephone Service]]| subsid = | homepage = http://www.centurylink.com/ }} '''Embarq Missouri, Inc.''' is a telephone operating company providing local telephone services in [[Missouri]] owned by [[CenturyLink]]. The company was established in [[1929]] as '''The United Telephone Company''', later changing its name to '''United Telephone Company of Missouri''' upon expansion of the United Telephone System. It was owned by [[United Telecommunications]]. United Utilities later became United Telecommunications in [[1972]], and acquired Sprint Long Distance from [[GTE]] in the [[1980s]]. The company later became [[Sprint Nextel|Sprint Corporation]] and United Telephone of Missouri then became '''Sprint Missouri, Inc.''', operating as part of the '''Sprint Local Telecommunications Division'''. Sprint Corporation, in [[2005]], acquired [[Nextel]] and changed its name to [[Sprint Nextel|Sprint Nextel Corporation]]. The company intended to spin-off its wireline assets into a separate company, which in [[2006]] occurred as [[Embarq|Embarq Corporation]]. Sprint Missouri then became '''Embarq Missouri, Inc.''' Embarq was acquired by [[CenturyTel]] in [[2009]], which in [[2010]] changed its name to '''CenturyLink'''. Embarq Missouri, at that point, began carrying on business under the CenturyLink name. ==External links== *[http://embarq.centurylink.com/missouri/ CenturyLink Missouri website (for former Embarq customers)] {{CenturyLink}} [[Category:CenturyLink]] [[Category:Sprint Nextel]] [[Category:Telecommunications companies of the United States]] [[Category:Communications in Missouri]] [[Category:Companies established in 1929]]
